Key.English: ALiVE Multispawn enables some handy Respawn functionalities! Please see our WiKi for more information!

Description

Spawn on Squad: BF style respawn (groupwise)!
Insertion: Simulates constant Air insertion (factionwise)!
Spawn in vehicle: Spawns players in synced HQ vehicle (factionwise)!
Spawn in building: Spawns players in a building of choice (factionwise)!

Markernames

Insertion:
ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_INSERTION_%FACTION%
ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_DESTINATION_%FACTION%

Faction based: ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_RESPAWN_%FACTION%
Group based (setGroupID): ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_RESPAWNGROUP_%GROUPID%
Spawn in vehicle (name vehicle): ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_RESPAWNVEHICLE_%FACTION%
Spawn in building: ALiVE_SUP_MULTISPAWN_RESPAWNBUILDING_%FACTION%

You can sync your custom vehicles of choice to the module! Keep in mind only vehicles of the same faction are used!
Select where players will be respawned
Add a wait time to respawn
Respawn vehicle classes for some dynamic respawn types (like "Insertion",...)!
Only one multispawn module can be used
Allowed to spawn on squadmates even if enemies are near!
Respawn with the same gear that the player carried when he was killed
